snippet: FRANKEL--Mickey. The congregation of Westchester Reform Temple mourns the death of its longtime, devoted member and former trustee and extends sympathy to her bereaved family. Helene K. Gray, President Jonathan E. Blake, Rabbi Jill Abramson, Cantor 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRANKEL--Mickey. The congregation of Westchester Reform Temple mourns the death of its longtime, devoted member and former trustee and extends sympathy to her bereaved family. Helene K. Gray, President Jonathan E. Blake, Rabbi Jill Abramson, Cantor 1/3
